H0.text: They are in different states and have different temperatures are the properties of the Earth's crust and mantle most responsible for Earth's tectonic activity.

H1.text: They are in the same state but have different temperatures are the properties of the Earth's crust and mantle that are most responsible for Earth's tectonic activity.

H2.text: They are in different states but have the same temperature are the properties of the Earth's crust and mantle most responsible for Earth's tectonic activity.

H3.text: They are the same state and have the same temperature, which are the properties of the Earth's crust and mantle most responsible for Earth's tectonic activity.

A4.text: The lithosphere is cooler and more rigid, while the asthenosphere is hotter and flows more easily.

A5.text: Density variations in the mantle are caused by thermal expansion and contraction from heat energy.
